typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['translated/parquet/app/middleware-prod/*.parquet']) ~> MdwLogsCsv
MdwLogsCsv sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	saveOrder: 1) ~> MdwLogsParquetConsolidated
